scripts.all: pnpm check && pnpm install && pnpm build && docker compose up --build
scripts.gateway: pnpm --filter gateway build && dotenv -- pnpm --filter gateway start
scripts.handler: pnpm --filter handler build && dotenv -- pnpm --filter handler start
scripts.database-setup: pnpm --filter database build && dotenv -- pnpm --filter database generate && dotenv -- pnpm --filter database push
